business_document_contact_info: Contact information must be clearly visible
verification_faq_description: Common questions about the verification process
faq_required_answer: Verification helps build trust and ensures platform security
faq_time_answer: Digital verification takes minutes, manual verification 1-2 business days
faq_security_answer: Yes, we use bank-level security to protect your data
faq_rejection: What if my verification is rejected?
faq_rejection_answer: You'll receive detailed feedback and can resubmit
faq_both_types: Do I need both types of verification?
faq_both_types_answer: No, you can choose either digital or manual verification

manual_verification_description: Upload your documents for manual verification by our team
id_document_hint: Upload a clear photo of your government-issued ID (passport, driver's licence, or national ID)
proof_of_address_hint: Upload a recent utility bill, bank statement, or official letter (not older than 3 months)
notes_hint: Add any relevant information that might help with the verification process
business_registration_hint: Upload your official business registration certificate or company formation documents
real_estate_license_hint: Upload your valid real estate licence or professional certification
business_address_hint: Upload a recent utility bill or official document showing your business address (not older than 3 months)
notes_placeholder: Add any additional information that might help with the verification process...
benefit_trust_description: Build trust with potential clients and partners by verifying your identity
step_choose_type_description: Select whether you want to verify as an individual user or as a business or agency
step_select_method_description: Choose between digital verification (fast) or manual verification (document upload)
step_submit_documents_description: Upload the required documents based on your verification type and method
step_review_approval_description: We will review your submission and notify you of the result.

newsletter.title: Stay Updated with Inmobi
newsletter.description: Get the latest property listings, market insights, and exclusive offers delivered to your inbox

success.title: Successfully Subscribed!
success.description: Thank you for subscribing to our newsletter

newsletter.privacyNotice: By subscribing, you agree to our

verification.title: Secure Property Transactions
verification.subtitle: Every visit is verified, every signature is protected, every transaction is secure

identity.title: Identity Verification
identity.description: We verify every client's identity. No fake data — full legal protection.
identity.tooltip: Why verify identity? It prevents fraud and keeps your deal safe.

geolocation.title: Visit Proof with Geolocation
geolocation.description: We record exact location, date, and time of each visit with a digital certificate.
geolocation.tooltip: What does geolocation do? It confirms the visit happened and records it securely.

signature.title: Electronic Signature with QR Code
signature.description: Visitors sign digitally with QR code — faster, paperless, fully valid.
signature.tooltip: Why electronic signatures? Sign quickly, no paper, legally valid.

documents.title: Document Verification
documents.description: We check income statements with anti-fraud technology. Fake documents get detected.
documents.tooltip: How does anti-fraud check work? We detect fake documents before they cause problems.

reminders.title: Appointment Reminders
reminders.description: Automatic reminders before each visit reduce no-shows by 50% on average.
reminders.tooltip: Why reminders? They ensure clients show up and save your time.

crossVerification.title: Cross Verification with DIDIT
crossVerification.description: Extra security with identity cross-check through DIDIT for premium users.
crossVerification.tooltip: What's DIDIT? It's an extra layer of identity verification for maximum security.

cta.title: Protect Your Property Deals Today
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of agents who trust our verification system to secure their transactions

hero.title: Find your dream property
hero.description: Discover thousands of properties for sale and rent worldwide
hero.mainTitle: Your search for the perfect property starts here
hero.searchPlaceholder: Search by location, property type, or keywords...
hero.familyHomeAlt: Happy family with dog in modern home

featuredProperties.title: Featured Properties
featuredProperties.subtitle: Discover our handpicked selection of premium properties
featuredProperties.noProperties: No properties available at the moment

searchSection.title: Find Your Dream Property
searchSection.subtitle: Discover amazing properties that match your lifestyle and budget

qrCode.title: QR Code Property Visits
qrCode.subtitle: Secure, verified property visits with digital proof of attendance
qrCode.tooltip: Your QR code confirms your visit. Keep it safe and ready to show when you arrive.

overview.step1: QR code sent to your email & app
overview.step2: Scan on-site to prove the visit
overview.step4: Inmobi logo or your agency's logo on Premium

generation.title: QR Code Generation
generation.description: Unique QR code created for each scheduled visit
generation.detail: When you book a property tour, our system automatically generates a unique QR code linked to your appointment.

delivery.title: Code Delivery
delivery.description: QR code sent to email and in-app messages
delivery.detail: You'll receive your QR code via email and it will appear in your app messages for easy access.

usage.title: Show Your Code
usage.description: Display QR code on phone or print when arriving
usage.detail: Present your QR code (digital or printed) to the agent or property owner when you arrive at the property.

checkin.title: Agent Scans Code
checkin.description: Real estate agent scans to verify your visit
checkin.detail: The agent scans your QR code to confirm your identity and link you to your scheduled appointment.

verification.title: Visit Verified
verification.description: Location, date, and time recorded as digital proof
verification.detail: The scan creates a digital certificate with exact location, timestamp, and visitor information for legal protection.

security.title: Prevents Fraud
security.description: Eliminates fake visits and protects all parties from disputes with verified digital proof.

efficiency.title: Saves Time
efficiency.description: Quick check-in process replaces paperwork and manual verification systems.

branding.title: Professional Image
branding.description: Custom agency logos on QR codes for premium users enhance your brand presence.

premium.title: Premium QR Code Features
premium.description: Upgrade to display your agency's logo on QR codes and access advanced visit analytics.

cta.title: Ready to Schedule Secure Visits?
cta.description: Start using QR code verification for all your property visits today.
